title: God is a Turtle: Teaching English Abroad: The Raw Cut
description: In pursuit of freedom and self-discovery, a young man departs his familiar shores in North Carolina, embarking on a transformative journey to teach English in the heart of China. What unfolds is a riveting odyssey into the unpredictable chaos of life, a world where the raw and the beautiful entwine in unexpected ways. From the chilling confines of a Chinese jail to experiencing nightmarish hallucinations with shamans in the deep mountains of Colombia. His experiences shatter preconceptions and lead him to a sort of 'Fear and Loathing' adventure across the globe. Settling in Tahiti, the turmoil belies the tranquuility etched deep withinâ€”a violent reminder that amidst life's beauty and truth, chaos is always lingering like a caged bluebird in his heart.
author: Bradley Krae
